description: Meltingly tender lamb shanks look after themselves in the slow cooker and are perfect served with creamy mash.
keywords: Slow Cooker Lamb Shanks with Rosemary & Thyme
name: Slow Cooker Lamb Shanks with Rosemary & Thyme Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour over the beef stock and cook on low for 8 hours, until tender. Mash potatoes and serve.
